Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: Based on the report of an environmental violation, the violation in question involves the illegal dumping of hazardous waste into the ocean. The specific location of the violation is not mentioned in the question. However, assuming it occurred within the jurisdiction of the west coast of the USA, it could be in the waters off California, Oregon, or Washington. The report does not provide any specific directions regarding the violation, such as the identity of the responsible party or the quantity and nature of the hazardous waste dumped. Without further information, it is difficult to provide a more detailed description of the violation.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
